phrs.translation: 无耻之徒, 不要脸, 无耻, 无耻家庭
无耻之徒第一季, 无耻之徒, 第二季, 第三季
最佳无耻的宣传寻找者, 寻觅者
无耻之徒, 无耻之徒英版
真是不要脸, 真翻译公司

sentences.sentence: The activities that may have got the benefit of the doubt in the bubble years now look like shameless envelope-pushing.
sentences.translation: 这些活动在经济泡沫时期也许能无罪推定，但现在看来，更像是无耻的挑战原则底线。

sentences.sentence: The shameless admission of the stitch-up should have been a humiliating slap in the face for any self-respecting audience.
sentences.translation: 这次权利交接中无耻的行为，对任何有自尊心的观众而言，应该像一巴掌打在脸上那样耻辱。

sentences.sentence: "I was surprised and angered because it's the most shameless use of a real person to make up the image of a terrorist, " Llamazares said.
sentences.translation: 利亚马萨雷斯说：“我感到震惊和愤怒。使用真人照片合成恐怖分子的画像，真是无耻至极。”
